title: Wonderful to kind of odd.
review: When I first saw this movie, way back when, I was fascinated by Kim Novak. Such a beautiful cultured woman. The girl of any college boy's dreams. Well so on goes the movie until near the end when Kim Novak was shown as being nothing but an office worker that was paid to do a job. Just unbelievable that she was actually capable of acting the beautiful cultured woman when she turns out to really be a ditzy blonde, that sort of killed the movie for me.After seeing the movie recently, the only thing I can comment on is why did make up give her those hairy 1950 Barbie doll eyebrows?
